eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}\label{top-act}
 \int _{{M_8}} \cal L &=&\int _{{M_8}} s 
\Big[ 
\bar \Psi^{(-1)ac^-} (b ^{(0)cb^-} + \o^{cb^-}(e) - G_d^{cb^-} e^d)\V_{ab}  \cr
& &\ \ +\bar\chi^{(-1)a} \Big (b^{(0)}_a +\partial_a \sigma
+\Omega_{abcd}G_{bcd}  \Big  ) \Big]
\cr 
& & + s \Big[  \partial_{[\mu}A^{(-2)}_{\nu]^-} (\Psi^{(1)a}_{[\mu}
e^a_{\nu]}+\Psi^{(1)}_{\mu\nu} ) \ \Big]\cr &&
s\Big[ 
e^\mu_c e^\nu_d \  \bar{\tilde\Phi}^{(-2)cd^+}( {
\Psi}^{(1)}_{\mu\nu} -\Psi^{(1)a}_{[\mu}e^a_{\nu]})\Big],
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{threeform}
\let\hw=\hidewidth
\matrix
{ && &&   &&    &&  C_{\mu \nu \rho _{}}      \cr
   &&    &&    &&         &   \hw\swarrow\hw  \cr

\hw &&      &&     R^{(-3) }_{\mu  } \cr
  &\hw\swarrow\hw   &&  &&\hw\swarrow\hw    &&&& \hw\swarrow\hw 
&& &&\hw\swarrow\hw \cr
M^{(4)}  &&  && \hw N^{(2) } ,     b^{(2) }_\mu\hw &&  &&   N^{(0) } , b^{(0)}_\mu
&&        &&   \hw N^{(-2) }  , b^{(-2) }_\mu \hw &&   && M^{(-4) }   \cr
&&   & \hw\swarrow\hw & && & \hw\swarrow\hw
&&&  & \hw\swarrow\hw & && & \hw\swarrow\hw \cr
&&\eta^{(3) }  &&  &&        \eta^{(1) } && &&  \eta^{(-1) } &&  &&
  \eta^{(-3) }
}
 \nonumber
